meanings.sent1: She was puking after eating too much candy.
meanings.sent2: The baby started puking all over the floor.
meanings.sent3: The clown puking confetti made the children laugh.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing sink was puking dirty water.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster ride made her feel like puking.

meanings.sent1: The sound of puking echoed in the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't stand the smell of the puking.
meanings.sent3: The movie scene with puking made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing trash can looked like a pile of puking.
meanings.sent5: The sight of puking made her turn away in disgust.
